item.title: De Grote Peiling 13-12-2019 - confidence intervals
item.description: import {Runtime, Inspector} from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@observablehq/runtime@4/dist/runtime.js"; import notebook from "https:\/\/api.observablehq.com\/@twielfaert\/vlaamse-kiesintenties.js?v=3"; const inspect = Inspector.into("#obs-notebook"); (new Runtime).module(notebook, name = (name === "chart") && inspect());
